dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 410 EH: Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To extend the Alaska Native Vietnam era veterans land allotment program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Extension Act of 2025.

section.header: Extension of the Alaska Native Vietnam Era Veterans Land Allotment Program
section.text: Section 1119(b)(3)(B) of the John D. Dingell, Jr. Conservation, Management, and Recreation Act (43 U.S.C. 1629gâ€“1(b)(3)(B)) is amended by striking 5-year period and inserting 10-year period.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 14, 2025.
